gen2_pokemon_1.png.name: Aipom
gen2_pokemon_1.png.description: Aipom lives high in the trees and uses its tail to swing from branch to branch with great agility.

gen2_pokemon_2.png.name: Bellossom
gen2_pokemon_2.png.description: Bellossom dances in fields full of flowers, releasing a soothing and fragrant aroma.

gen2_pokemon_3.png.name: Blissey
gen2_pokemon_3.png.description: Blissey brings happiness with its kind heart and shares its egg with those in need.

gen2_pokemon_4.png.name: Chikorita
gen2_pokemon_4.png.description: Chikorita uses the leaf on its head to sense the warmth and humidity of its surroundings.

gen2_pokemon_5.png.name: Corsola
gen2_pokemon_5.png.description: Corsola lives in clean seas and forms coral reefs by shedding its branches.

gen2_pokemon_6.png.name: Cyndaquil
gen2_pokemon_6.png.description: Cyndaquil protects itself by igniting flames on its back, creating intense heat.

gen2_pokemon_7.png.name: Dunsparce
gen2_pokemon_7.png.description: Dunsparce digs into the ground using its tail and hides itself when threatened.

gen2_pokemon_8.png.name: Elekid
gen2_pokemon_8.png.description: Elekid generates electricity by spinning its arms. It often causes blackouts in houses.

gen2_pokemon_9.png.name: Heracross
gen2_pokemon_9.png.description: Heracross uses its immense strength to throw foes and enjoys feasting on tree sap.

gen2_pokemon_10.png.name: Hoothoot
gen2_pokemon_10.png.description: Hoothoot always keeps time perfectly, using its internal organs as a clock.

gen2_pokemon_11.png.name: Houndour
gen2_pokemon_11.png.description: Houndour hunts in packs and communicates with others using various howls.

gen2_pokemon_12.png.name: Kingdra
gen2_pokemon_12.png.description: Kingdra lives in the depths of the ocean, creating whirlpools to trap prey.

gen2_pokemon_13.png.name: Larvitar
gen2_pokemon_13.png.description: Larvitar eats mountains and gains strength to prepare for evolution.

gen2_pokemon_14.png.name: Ledyba
gen2_pokemon_14.png.description: Ledyba is a social Pok√©mon that gathers in groups to share warmth and shelter.

gen2_pokemon_15.png.name: Mantine
gen2_pokemon_15.png.description: Mantine glides smoothly through the sea and is often seen swimming with Remoraid.

gen2_pokemon_16.png.name: Mareep
gen2_pokemon_16.png.description: Mareep stores static electricity in its wool and releases it in shocks.

gen2_pokemon_17.png.name: Marill
gen2_pokemon_17.png.description: Marill uses the oil-filled ball on its tail to float and swim across rivers.

gen2_pokemon_18.png.name: Misdreavus
gen2_pokemon_18.png.description: Misdreavus frightens people with its wails and feeds on their fear.

gen2_pokemon_19.png.name: Murkrow
gen2_pokemon_19.png.description: Murkrow is often seen as a bad omen, but it is clever and quick-witted.

gen2_pokemon_20.png.name: Natu
gen2_pokemon_20.png.description: Natu picks at food on the ground and is known for its ability to foresee the future.

gen2_pokemon_21.png.name: Octillery
gen2_pokemon_21.png.description: Octillery uses its suction cups to cling to surfaces and shoots ink to escape foes.

gen2_pokemon_22.png.name: Phanpy
gen2_pokemon_22.png.description: Phanpy is strong despite its small size and loves playing by rolling around.

gen2_pokemon_23.png.name: Pichu
gen2_pokemon_23.png.description: Pichu charges itself by playing and often releases jolts of electricity by accident.

gen2_pokemon_24.png.name: Pineco
gen2_pokemon_24.png.description: Pineco hangs from trees and explodes to protect itself when disturbed.

gen2_pokemon_25.png.name: Qwilfish
gen2_pokemon_25.png.description: Qwilfish inflates its body to appear larger and fires sharp spines at enemies.

gen2_pokemon_26.png.name: Skarmory
gen2_pokemon_26.png.description: Skarmory's steel body is both lightweight and durable, making it an excellent flier.

gen2_pokemon_27.png.name: Slugma
gen2_pokemon_27.png.description: Slugma's body is made of molten lava, and it needs to stay warm to survive.

gen2_pokemon_28.png.name: Snubbull
gen2_pokemon_28.png.description: Snubbull may look gruff, but it is surprisingly playful and affectionate.

gen2_pokemon_29.png.name: Sudowoodo
gen2_pokemon_29.png.description: Sudowoodo disguises itself as a tree to avoid predators and mimic its surroundings.

gen2_pokemon_30.png.name: Sunflora
gen2_pokemon_30.png.description: Sunflora converts sunlight into energy and becomes active during bright sunny days.

gen2_pokemon_31.png.name: Swinub
gen2_pokemon_31.png.description: Swinub uses its sensitive nose to sniff out food buried beneath the snow.

gen2_pokemon_32.png.name: Teddiursa
gen2_pokemon_32.png.description: Teddiursa licks its paws, which are soaked with honey collected from beehives.

gen2_pokemon_33.png.name: Togepi
gen2_pokemon_33.png.description: Togepi stores happiness in its shell and shares it with kind-hearted people.

gen2_pokemon_34.png.name: Totodile
gen2_pokemon_34.png.description: Totodile has strong jaws that can crush anything, but it sometimes bites playfully.

gen2_pokemon_35.png.name: Wobbuffet
gen2_pokemon_35.png.description: Wobbuffet endures attacks with patience and counterattacks with great force.

gen2_pokemon_36.png.name: Wooper
gen2_pokemon_36.png.description: Wooper lives in cold water and covers its body with a slimy film to stay hydrated.
